text: <@U0Z41KY5V> would like to have a distinct project in JIRA to make administration of the python SDK project easier. specifically, this would let me make him an administrator of his project and run his sprints etc distinct from the fabric sprints. right now he can't create and edit sprints, for instance.

I don't want to do this willy nilly - if there is a reason to have all of the fabric projects on one cadence with <@U0KM61BCP> as the only admin, that's OK. in that case, though, I would propose granting project leads administrator privileges on the overall project (FAB in this case)
